title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 441.83 - Date of change in certified bed capacity-decrease
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 441.83 - Date of change in certified bed capacity-decrease

State Regulations
(a) Partial decertification of beds in a
unit. The date proposed in the hospital's letter of intent to decertify filed
with the Department of Health and subsequently approved. (b) Retroactive decertification of part or
all of a unit. The date promulgated by the Department of Health. (c) Full decertification of beds in a unit. The date the last patient was discharged from the unit. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
441.83

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
